page.title: 16MOTORWAY SERVICE STATION
page.content: { The service station was opened in November 1965, but the petrol station was opened in January 1965. The firm is called Top Rank. The shape of the service station is a hexagon but some people call it the mushroom service station.There are three restaurants, one for the public, one for lorry drivers and one for the staff.Top Rank is opening another restaurant on the south side.Things at the service station are four shops,Postoffice, Postbox, Telephone,Picnic area,Lorry park, Car park, Petrol Station, Toilets, Car Repairs, AA Kiosk and a Viewing Area. People work 8 hours a day 7am _ 3pm _ 11pm_ 7am.There are 157 people who work there, seven of them come from Forton. In the winter 100 people work there.In the summer there are 200 people who work there.
